companies.name: Google
companies.reason: Google has recently announced two new AI chips, the Tensor 3 and the Edge TPU 3, which are set to be utilized in the next generation of Pixel phones and other devices. This move signals a significant advancement in their AI technology amidst ongoing competition in the AI chip market.

companies.name: Advanced Micro Devices
companies.reason: AMD has announced a strategic partnership with OpenAI to deploy up to 6 gigawatts of AMD GPUs, which is expected to significantly boost its revenue. They project to generate over $2 billion in sales next year from their new AI chip lineup, reflecting strong demand in the AI sector.

companies.name: Anthropic
companies.reason: Anthropic has partnered with Google Cloud in a significant deal worth tens of billions, aimed at leveraging AI capabilities. This partnership is part of a broader trend of tech companies integrating AI solutions into their cloud infrastructures.
